fr.cdiEnterprise.util

Class MpClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.cdiEnterprise.util.MpClient

  • public class MpClient
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is going to give you the control over sending, receiving , editing and removing messages. only the draft message can be edited. to put message in the draft folder, use the following method draft(String from, String to, String obj, String bdy). at that point we put the draft variable to true in the message. to edit and send a message you will have to follow those steps : Pop the message from the server(draft folder of your user), by calling popMessage method then, use the sendEmail method. As soon as the message is send out to the final user, the timestamp is setup, the draft boolean will be put on false.
    Version:
    01-10-2016
    Author:
    Nicolas Tarral

        This method is going to send new email to other users.
        Parameters:
        from - this is to indicate the user who send the email
        to - this is to indicate the user who receive the email
        obj - this is to provide the email's object
        bdy - the body of the message.
        Returns:
        this will return true if the message was correctly sent out
